title: Add uploaded partner photo to Partners section

requirements.summary: Add the uploaded photo UMB PHOTO.jpg as a partner profile image in the Partners section, storing it as a static asset and displaying it in the Partners component
acceptanceCriteria: The image UMB PHOTO.jpg is saved as frontend/public/assets/generated/umb-photo.jpg
The Partners section displays the photo as a partner's profile picture
The photo renders correctly on desktop and mobile layouts

file_operations.description: Add the cropped and optimized partner photo from UMB PHOTO.jpg as a 400x400 square headshot with neutral background. This image will be used as a profile picture in the Partners component.

Update the Partners component to display the newly added partner photo at frontend/public/assets/generated/umb-photo.dim_400x400.jpg. Ensure the photo is rendered with the same styling and responsive behavior as existing partner images, maintaining consistency with the current grid layout and image aspect ratios.
